targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "current_power_usage" WHERE ("alias" = 'KOL3 Mac Mini' OR "alias" = 'KOL4 MacBook Pro Dock' OR "alias" = 'KOR1 Home Computer') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($kdb_interval), "alias" fill(null)
